posting.title: Fears of global pandemic escalate further as SARS outbreak spreads to India

mission.posting:
By Ismail Ahmad
The world has their eyes on the ongoing SARS outbreak situation as its first confirmed case is detected in India. Roy Zhang, 24, traveled from his home town of Wuhan to Delhi, where he first started to notice symptoms.
As of now, there are over 10,400 cases within China, and it is rapidly spreading throughout the country. The Foreign Secretary of China has advised citizens to remain inside, and is in discussions with other nearby governments about limiting travel to and from the country.
More on this story as it continues.
